mapper.select: SELECT T.PRJT_CD prjtCd, T.DSTRBT_SEQ_NO dstrbtSeqNo, T.PRSN_NO prsnNo, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '004' AND DTL_CD = T.CNTRCT_SECT_CD) cntrctSectCdNm, T.WORK_START_DT workStartDt, T.WORK_END_DT workEndDt, T.DSTRBT_SECT_CD dstrbtSectCd, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '011' AND DTL_CD = T.DSTRBT_SECT_CD) dstrbtSectCdNm, T.SALES_UNIT_COST_AMT salesUnitCostAmt, T.ORDR_UNIT_CST_AMT ordrUnitCstAmt, T.SKILL_SECT_CD skillSectCd, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '006' AND DTL_CD = T.SKILL_SECT_CD) skillSectCdNm, T.PRSN_MM prsnMm, T.MEMO_DESC memoDesc, T.PRSN_NM prsnNm, T.CNTRCT_SECT_CD cntrctSectCd, (SELECT IF(COUNT(1)>0, 'Y', 'N') FROM T_PMS011 WHERE PRJT_CD=T.PRJT_CD AND PRSN_NO=T.PRSN_NO) prjtPrsnCnt FROM ( SELECT T1.PRJT_CD, T1.DSTRBT_SEQ_NO, T1.PRSN_NO, T1.WORK_START_DT, T1.WORK_END_DT, T1.DSTRBT_SECT_CD, T1.SALES_UNIT_COST_AMT, T1.ORDR_UNIT_CST_AMT, T1.SKILL_SECT_CD, T1.PRSN_MM, T1.MEMO_DESC, T2.PRSN_NM, T2.CNTRCT_SECT_CD FROM T_PMS007 T1, T_PMS003 T2 WHERE T1.PRSN_NO=T2.PRSN_NO AND T1.PRJT_CD = #{prjtCd} ORDER BY T1.DSTRBT_SEQ_NO ASC) T
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PMS007 ( PRJT_CD, DSTRBT_SEQ_NO, PRSN_NO, WORK_START_DT, WORK_END_DT, DSTRBT_SECT_CD, SALES_UNIT_COST_AMT, ORDR_UNIT_CST_AMT, SKILL_SECT_CD, PRSN_MM, MEMO_DESC, RGT_TM, RGTR_ID, UPT_TM, UPTR_ID ) VALUES ( #{prjtCd}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(DSTRBT_SEQ_NO), 0)+1 FROM T_PMS007 ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE PRJT_CD=#{prjtCd}), #{prsnNo}, #{workStartDt}, #{workEndDt}, #{dstrbtSectCd}, #{salesUnitCostAmt}, #{ordrUnitCstAmt}, #{skillSectCd}, #{prsnMm}, #{memoDesc}, NOW(), #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{uptrId} )
mapper.select: SELECT FORMAT(ROUND(workSalesTotAmt/1000)*1000, 0) workSalesTotAmt, FORMAT(A01+A02+A03, 0) ectSalesTotAmt, FORMAT(ROUND((workSalesTotAmt+IFNULL(A01, 0)+IFNULL(A02, 0)+IFNULL(A03, 0))/1000)*1000, 0) salesTotAmt FROM ( SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN DSTRBT_SECT_CD = '001' THEN SALES_UNIT_COST_AMT * PRSN_MM END)) workSalesTotAmt, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN DSTRBT_SECT_CD = '002' THEN DATEDIFF(WORK_END_DT, WORK_START_DT)+1 * SALES_UNIT_COST_AMT END)) A01, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN DSTRBT_SECT_CD = '003' THEN SALES_UNIT_COST_AMT END)) A02, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN DSTRBT_SECT_CD = '004' THEN SALES_UNIT_COST_AMT END)) A03 FROM T_PMS007 WHERE PRJT_CD=#{prjtCd}) T
